hero.subtitle: Break the limits. Find your flow.

philosophy.subtitle: More than movement
philosophy.description: Flow Syndicate is a collective of dancers, artists, and dreamers united by the culture of breaking. We believe in authenticity, creativity, and the power of community. Here, you don't just learn moves—you discover your unique voice through movement.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.noChildren: You haven't added any participants yet
dashboard.firstClassFreeNote: Your first class is free. We'll check by phone or email if this is your first visit.

admin.confirmDeleteClass: Are you sure you want to delete this class?

beginners.title: Group Classes for Beginners
beginners.description: Perfect for those just starting their journey in breaking. Learn the fundamentals in a supportive group environment.

advanced.title: Group Classes for Advanced
advanced.description: For those who have mastered the basics. Take your skills to the next level with challenging routines and techniques.

individual.title: Personal Training
individual.description: One-on-one sessions tailored to your goals. Get personalized attention and accelerate your progress.

ilya.description: Professional breaking instructor with years of experience in teaching and performing.
ilya.experience: Over 10 years of experience in breaking, multiple competition wins, and extensive teaching background.
ilya.approach: Focuses on building strong foundations while encouraging creativity and self-expression. Combines traditional breaking techniques with modern approaches to help students find their unique style.
